ing.item: Jonathan apples; peeled, cored and thinly sliced

directions.step:
Bake puff pastry shells according to package directions. Melt butter in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Saut√© apples and sugar 12-15 minutes, stirring frequently. (Reduce heat if necessary to keep apples from burning.) When apples begin to caramelize, reduce heat to medium. Stir in evaporated milk and cardamom. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium low. Simmer 1 minute. Stir in pecans. Just before serving, spoon fruit mixture into baked puff pastry shells.
